phrases.chooseHelp1: (use arrows and key to select file)
phrases.readError2: Press backspace to show files list

clear: The command clears the terminal output
dir: The command displays a list of terminal files
help: The command displays help by command
Without parameters displays a list of available commands
Displays information about the command with the parameter
read: The command starts the file reading mode
Without parameters displays a list of text files to choose from
With the parameter starts reading the selected file
script: The command runs a script file
Without parameters displays a list of script files to choose from
with the parameter runs the file directly
